description: Episode of Series "Global report". This compilation tape consists of two programs. 1. "Emergency situation in Africa" illustrates the related problems of farming, malnutrition, disease and rural-urban migration in Africa. (22 mins.) 2. "Valley of hope" shows some of the benefits of having a health care worker in a developing country by comparing infant survival in two villages in Colombia; one which has a health care worker and one which doesn't (30 mins.) "Valley of hope" is also available as an individual title.
